exercises.name: Pull-ups
exercises.description: Hang from a bar and pull your body up until your chin is above the bar.

exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.description: Lower and raise your body with your hands on the ground, keeping your body straight.

exercises.name: Dips
exercises.description: Lower and raise your body using parallel bars or a bench, focusing on triceps and chest.

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.description: Bend your knees and lower your hips, then stand back up, engaging your legs and glutes.

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.description: Step forward with one leg, lower your body, then push back to starting position.

exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.description: A full-body exercise involving a squat, plank, and jump.

exercises.name: Monkey Bars
exercises.description: Swing across bars using your arms, great for upper body strength.

exercises.name: Step-ups
exercises.description: Step onto a raised platform and back down, engaging legs and glutes.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: Hold a push-up position to strengthen core muscles.

exercises.name: Jump Rope
exercises.description: Jump continuously over a rope, great for cardio and coordination.
